common.name: Name
common.nb_code:
If a system variable starts with a number, please use it in name field instead of code field. 
 Code can not starts with a number.

homepage.data_analysis_content: The analysis of trends in energy consumption and climate well-being is realized through indicators, rather synthetic data representative of the trends. The analysis by indicator, is a summary that does not replace the detailed analysis, but makes the trends immediately understandable in a given period of time.
homepage.credits_content: The analysis was carried out with scientific contributions from the following research groups from the POLYTECHNIC OF TURIN
homepage.calculation_content: The data collected by the Applus.Energie project, whose software is released under the Apache Software License (http://www.apache.org/licenses/) are processed and presented by the product, ORATIO4ENERGY licensed under GPLv3 (http://gplv3.fsf.org/).
